name: Rogue Chicken
description:
Rogue Chicken is a small top down rogue-like and bullet hell with procedural level generation made for the Weekly Game Jam #130. 

When you die, you can possess enemies and get their weapons.

The theme was Dying is rewarded.

Controls:

  • WASD (or Arrows) to Move
  • Mouse to Shoot
  • E to Interact

Play the game and let us know what you think!

All feedback is appreciated!

Made with Maja Salamon

https://aquagonn.wixsite.com/portfolio
